name: The Shadow below Providence
description:
"During the winter of 1927–28 officials of the Federal government made a strange and secret investigation of certain conditions in the ancient city of Providence.

A new cult arose and different to others before them, they knew what they were about to do. A gate should be opened and YOU should be let into their world.

Arise, Yog-Sothoth, claim what is yours for the taking."

----------------------------------------------

This game was made in 48 hours for the #minibeansjam5; A gamejam of the RocketBeansTV-Community.

The theme for the gamejam was to choose 2 out of 3 themes:

  • Elastisch (Elastic)
  • Jenseits (Beyond or Afterlife)
  • Explosion

The game is heavily inspired by lovecraftian fiction.

-------------------------------------------

Credits:

Programming - @AndideBob

Graphics - @ToastiChron

Music - @DJBBone

And a font by ChequeredInk
